tool.name: cooler_cload_tabix
tool.description: Create a cooler from a tabix-indexed contact file and a list of genomic bins.
tool.command: #if $downloaded.isDownloaded: bgzip -c $input_pairs > input.tabix && tabix -f -s $downloaded.c1 -b $downloaded.p1 -e $downloaded.p1 input.tabix && #else: ln -s $input_pairs > input.tabix && ln -s ${input_pairs}.tbi && #end if cooler cload tabix --assembly $assembly -c2 $c2 -p2 $p2 $input_bed $input_pairs $output

param.name: isDownloaded
param.label: Is your pair tabix file coming from upload?

param.name: c1
param.label: field number in the input file (starting from 1) of the chromosome of mate 1.

param.name: p1
param.label: field number in the input file (starting from 1) of the position of mate 1.

param.name: c2
param.label: field number in the input file (starting from 1) of the chromosome of mate 2 (same as in csort).

param.name: p2
param.label: field number in the input file (starting from 1) of the position of mate 2 (same as in csort).

tool.help:
**cooler cload** tool developped by mirnylab see https://github.com/mirnylab/cooler
command-line::
cooler cload tabix --assembly assembly -c2 c2 -p2 p2 input_bed input_pairs output
